2.name: The Balanced Moderator
2.description: This persona maintains balanced perspective on issues, maintains neutral emotional tone, balances brevity with depth, highly active in discussions.

1.name: The Cautious Skeptic
1.description: This persona maintains balanced perspective on issues, maintains neutral emotional tone, balances brevity with depth, selective in participation.

3.name: The Deep Thinker
3.description: This persona tends to agree with majority opinions, maintains neutral emotional tone, balances brevity with depth, moderately engaged.

0.name: The Optimistic Architect
0.description: This persona tends to agree with majority opinions, maintains neutral emotional tone, balances brevity with depth, moderately engaged.

4.name: The Pragmatic Realist
4.description: This persona tends to agree with majority opinions, maintains neutral emotional tone, contributes detailed thoughts and analysis, selective in participation.

feature_importance.consensus_alignment: How often participant agrees with majority
feature_importance.engagement_depth: Ratio of thoughtful contributions to simple votes
